name: NeuDark [Stylish]
description: NeuDark is an eye-saver modification of the Stylish and Stylus Admin interface for Chrome. The interface is completely redesigned for a dark experience, incorporating Font Awesome icons and a semi-material theme. NeuDark currently supports all of the dark syntax themes shipped with both platforms and will support light-to-dark theme conversions in the future. VIEW CHANGELOG You can view more details and screenshots at the NeuDark @ GitHub If you come across any bugs, please post them in the NeuDark Issues area of the repo.
additional_info: IMPORTANT This userstyle is built for Chrome. It does not support Firefox or Opera. It may work partially in either, I dunno, but it is made for Chrome. Please don't add a negative rating or post a comment that it doesn't work in Firefox or Opera. If you want to use it, use Chrome. Thank you. Also, currently there is a 50/50 chance for future support for Stylish. The Stylish extension, once such a simple and beautiful thing, has become more bloated and changes with every release. I have to keep restyling the same things over and over, and it is becoming bothersome to say the least. The current version of this theme with Stylish has a broken dropdown extension menu (because they changed it... again). This may never be resolved. The rest still works fine. This style also works with Stylus and I recommend you use that instead to continue to receive updates. --- VERSION 2.5 OUT NOW This is a major update, but I didn't want to release it as v3 for various reasons since the interface and overall look/style hasn't changed drastically. NeuDark now supports both the latest Stylish and Stylus extensions for Chrome. The Stylish popup menu has been completely reworked. For Stylus, a new look has been styled specific for the extension with a few aesthetic differences. Enjoy. It is highly recommended that you use tommorow-night-bright syntax theme in Stylish and zenburn in Stylus. These syntax themes match the stylesheet best. All syntax themes will be updated and supported on the next release. Thanks for checking out my style! If it makes you happy, makes your browsing experience easier, or you just are feeling generous, please feel free to send me a donation via the link below. I am a struggling developer and every little bit helps, even if it's only 50 cents! THANK YOU and ENJOY.

.main-controls{width:calc(100% - 25px)}#stylus-popup #installed .main-controls label{padding-right:10px;font-weight:400}#stylus-popup #installed .actions{padding:0;height:16px}#stylus-popup #installed .actions a{margin:0!important;border:none!important}#stylus-popup .svg-icon path,#stylus-popup .svg-icon polygon,#stylus-popup .svg-icon rect{fill:#666}#stylus-popup a:hover .svg-icon path,#stylus-popup a:hover .svg-icon polygon,#stylus-popup a:hover .svg-icon rect{fill:#DFAF8F}#stylus-popup .actions{margin:0!important;padding:0 1.2em;padding-bottom:calc(2.4em + 56px)}#stylus-popup .actions #disable-all-wrapper{margin:0px -1.2em 1.2em;padding:1.2em;border-top:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)!important;border-bottom:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)!important;background:#333333}#stylus-popup .actions .main-controls{display:block;margin-bottom:.25em}#stylus-popup .actions #disable-all-wrapper .main-controls{display:table-cell;vertical-align:middle}#stylus-popup .actions .main-controls #find-styles{text-align:center}#stylus-popup .actions .main-controls #write-style{margin:1.2em 0 0 0;padding:1.2em 0 0;border-top:1px solid #444}#stylus-popup .actions .main-controls #write-style #write-style-for{display:block;margin:0 0 .25em 0;color:#999;font-size:18px;font-weight:300}#popup-options{padding:0;position:absolute;width:calc(100% - 2.4em);bottom:1.2em}.breadcrumbs.url\(\) > .write-style-link,.breadcrumbs > .write-style-link:hover,.breadcrumbs > .write-style-link:focus,.breadcrumbs > .write-style-link:hover ~ .write-style-link[subdomain],.breadcrumbs > .write-style-link:focus ~ .write-style-link[subdomain]{text-decoration:none!important}#popup-options button{margin:0 3px 0 0;padding:15px}#popup-options button:last-child{margin-right:0!important}@media only screen and (max-width:350px){#popup-options button{font-size:0}}@media only screen and (min-width:351px){#popup-options button{font-size:inherit}#popup-options button:before{display:none}}
}
